channel.title: Tops on Yuming Fu's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Yuming Fu's Homepage

item.description: I am a PhD candidate in Astrophysics at Peking University in China. Currently I’m a guest PhD student at Leiden Observatory in the Netherlands. I’m interested in quasars/AGN, observational cosmology, stastical astrometry, as well as data mining on big-data sky surveys. Apart from my research, I write popular science articles and books, and translate some works in English into Chinese as well.

Some useful books for astronomers Textbooks or lecture notes Astronomy, Astrophysics and Cosmology Textbook on spherical astronomy by Smart, William Marshall, W. M. Smart, and R. M. Green. Cambridge University Press, 1977. Physics Technical books or manuals Statistics, Machine Learning and AI Operating Systems and shell Python, R and other languages Databases, SQL and so on Popular science books History of natural science / astronomy
